support.title: Help & Support
support.description: We are here to help you with your account, payments, safety and technical issues.
support.chooseCategory: Choose a category for your issue
support.responseTime: Our support team typically responds within 24 hours.
support.newTicket.title: Contact support
support.newTicket.subject: Subject
support.newTicket.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what happened, when and on which device.
support.newTicket.successMessage: Your support ticket has been created. We'll respond within 24 hours.
support.newTicket.footerText: Our support team typically responds within 24 hours. You'll receive updates in your support tickets section.
support.tickets.title: My support tickets
support.tickets.empty.title: No Support Tickets
support.tickets.empty.message: You haven't created any support tickets yet.
support.ticket.closedNotice: This ticket is {status}. You cannot reply anymore.
support.error.createFailed: Failed to create ticket. Please try again.
support.error.replyFailed: Failed to send reply. Please try again.
